name: Night & Day Cafe
notes: Right around the corner from the Hotel Del, can get to the island via ferry. All day breakfast. Try the apple pie.

name: San Diego Safari Park
notes: About 40 minutes outside of downtown San Diego, need rental car

name: Mike Hess Brewing
notes: locations in Ocean Beach, North Park and Miramar

name: Chicago Architecture Tour
notes: River Cruise Tour is the best for photography. Tours offered in the day and night.

name: Pequod's
notes: Check out Whale Tale nearby during restaurant wait
